content: in the rs in one of the holes make 42 double_crochet work in round 2-13 round decrease one chain in each row under the arm use a stitch mark iff you prefer 14rnd 3ch as first double_crochet *1 chain 1 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 15 round 2 slip_stitch 3 chain as first d1 1 double_crochet *2 double_crochet * in the spaces 16-17rds repeat round 14-15 18rnd 3 chain 1sc in the spaces bind off now weave and it´s done outubro de 2008 note if you have any question please mailto zzabelinha@gmail com outubro de 2008
